Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui.controllers

Class LobbyController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui.controllers.AbstractController
it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui.controllers.LobbyController
public class LobbyController extends AbstractController
Class representing Lobby controller. It manages the creation of a new game or the selection of an already existing game by the client.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Sets this in the GUInterface. Creates and sets the spinners. Sets the client nickname. Sets the listener to the gameListView.

    • createGame

      public void createGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Sends the selected game attributes to the GUInterface.
      Parameters:
      event - The createGameButton has been clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - Error with I/O.

    • selectGame

      public void selectGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Sends the selected game to the GUInterface. Notifies the client if the selection gone wrong.
      Parameters:
      event - The selectGameButton has been clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - Error with I/O.

    • listOfGames

      public void listOfGames(List<GameInfo> games)
      Updates the list of games showed by the GUI.
      Parameters:
      games - List of games received by the GUInterface.

    • failedCreateGame

      public void failedCreateGame()
      Notifies the client that the game creation gone wrong.

    • successfulCreateOrSelectGame

      public void successfulCreateOrSelectGame()
      Loads the WaitingRoom scene and then shows it.

    • endWindow

      public void endWindow()
      Closes the Launcher window when the game starts.
